Query¶

class litrevai.query.Query(lr, query_id)¶

A query is like a task to be performed as part of a project. It consists of a prompt and is identified by a (unique) name. When a query is run on an item, a Response object is created, which stores the answer to the query for that item.

as_filter(value=True)¶

Return all item keys, where the value of the responses to the query are equal to the specified value. :type value: :param value: :rtype: List[str] :return:
